RefParameter.Name: DDR_Start_Address
RefParameter.Comment: This is the base address for DDR subsystem in the specific MPU packages considered

RefParameter.Name: tRPRE
RefParameter.Description: Programmable READ preamble tRPRE, can be set to either 1tCK or 2tCK via the MR3 register.

RefParameter.Name: tWPRE
RefParameter.Description: Programmable WRITE preamble tWPRE, can either be set to 1tCK or 2 tCK via the MR3.

RefParameter.Name: FGRM
RefParameter.Description: Controls REFRESH cycle time and average refresh interval for the DDR4 SDRAM via the MR3, leave default 1x.

RefParameter.Name: VREF (%)
RefParameter.Description: VREFDQ Training Value: Fifty settings provided 0.65% of granularity steps sizes for both Range 1 and Range 2 of VREFDQ; Range 1 with 74.3% is set by default. (the optimal setting according to Impedance is determined during PHY Initialization).

RefParameter.Name: LPASR
RefParameter.Description: SELF REFRESH operation over different temperature ranges can use this feature to optimize the IDD6 current for a given temperature range as specified in the MR2 Register.

RefParameter.Name: ODI
RefParameter.Description: The output driver impedance of the DDR4 SDRAM device is selected via MR1.

RefParameter.Name: RTT_NOM
RefParameter.Description: DDR4 nominal termination programmed via MR1.

RefParameter.Name: RTT_nom
RefParameter.Description: DDR3 nominal termination programmed via MR1.

RefParameter.Name: RTT_WR
RefParameter.Description: DDR4 termination during Write programmed via MR2.

RefParameter.Name: RTT_PARK
RefParameter.Description: DDR4 parked termination programmed via MR5.

RefParameter.Name: WR-RTP
RefParameter.Description: Write recovery / READ to Precharge programmed in MR0 (this parameter is determined according to frequency and tWR / tRTP).

RefParameter.Name: WCL
RefParameter.Description: Write command latency applicable only when Write CRC and DM are enabled, leave default (4).

RefParameter.Name: memclk
RefParameter.Description: Memory Clock frequency, used to detemine timings.

RefParameter.Name: memclk
RefParameter.Description: Memory Clock frequency, used to detemine timings.

RefParameter.Name: version
RefParameter.Description:
Platform and cut selection:
1: Panther cut 1.x
2: Panther cut 2.x

RefParameter.Name: Addressing

RefParameter.Name: RDBI
RefParameter.Description: Data Bus Inversion for READ can be enabled to reduce power and to improve SI at the expense of additonal latency and timings degradation, it is not activated by default.
